DOC.brief_title: Comparing Strategies Translating Self-management Support Into Primary Care
DOC.detailed_description: The specific aim propose study : - Primary Specific Aims 1 . To conduct cluster randomize trial examine reach , effectiveness , adoption , implementation maintenance ( RE-AIM ) Connection Health ( CTH ) patient type 2 diabetes primary care practice setting . Primary effectiveness outcome include hemoglobin A1c , BMI , blood pressure LDL cholesterol . 2 . To determine incremental benefit , use RE-AIM framework , brief targeted practice coach implementation CTH diverse primary care practice . - Secondary Specific Aims 1 . To identify key practice characteristic ( e.g. , practice size , organization , set , level experience practice redesign effort ) impact CTH RE-AIM . These result inform dissemination CTH intervention . 2 . To determine relative cost associate implement CTH practice coach inform dissemination effort .
DOC.criteria: Age 21 year old Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus diagnose minimum 12 month Able read English Spanish Plan remain practice study period Developmentally disable Decisionally challenge Pregnant woman
